EDUCATION.SeniorHighSchool: Metropolitan Institute of Arts and Sciences

SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS.Description1: Ability to use imagination to generate new ideas
SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS.Description2: Capacity to identify goals and analyze situation to overcome the problem more rapidly
SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS.Description3: Accepts responsibility for the job and even acknowledges mistakes
SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS.Description4: Communicating and learning about other people to express thoughts and ideas through words, art, or other things
